select t.DATA_TYPE,t.DATA_COUNT,t.IRSL_DATE,t.DATA_DATE from ( select r.DATA_TYPE,r.DATA_COUNT,r.IRSL_DATE,r.DATA_DATE, row_number() over(partition by data_type order by IRSL_DATE desc ) as rn
from SJPT_REALTIME_STATIC_WEEK r) t
where t.data_type = #{type} and t.rn <= #{flag}
order by IRSL_DATE

select * from( select t.DATA_TYPE,t.DATA_COUNT,t.IRSL_DATE,t.DATA_DATE, row_number() over( order by IRSL_DATE desc ) as rn from ( select DATA_TYPE,DATA_COUNT,IRSL_DATE,DATA_DATE, row_number() over(partition by data_type,irsl_date order by data_date desc ) as rn from SJPT_REALTIME_STATIC_WEEK where data_type =#{type} ) t where t.rn =1 order by IRSL_DATE )f where f.rn<=#{flag}

select t.DATA_TYPE,t.DATA_COUNT,t.IRSL_DATE,t.DATA_DATE from (select DATA_TYPE,DATA_COUNT,IRSL_DATE,DATA_DATE, row_number() over(partition by irsl_date order by DATA_DATE desc ) as rn from SJPT_REALTIME_STATIC_WEEK where data_type= #{type} and irsl_date like #{year}||'%') t where t.rn=1 order by irsl_date

select t.DATA_TYPE,t.DATA_COUNT,t.IRSL_DATE,t.DATA_DATE from (select DATA_TYPE,DATA_COUNT,IRSL_DATE,DATA_DATE, row_number() over(partition by irsl_date order by DATA_DATE desc ) as rn from SJPT_REALTIME_STATIC_WEEK where data_type= #{type} and irsl_date like #{year}||'%') t where t.rn=1 order by irsl_date
select t.DATA_TYPE,t.DATA_COUNT,t.IRSL_DATE,t.DATA_DATE from SJPT_REALTIME_STATIC_WEEK t where t.data_type=#{type} and t.irsl_date=#{time} order by t.DATA_DATE

SELECT DATA_TYPE,DATA_COUNT,IRSL_DATE,DATA_DATE FROM (SELECT ID, DATA_TYPE, DATA_COUNT, IRSL_DATE, DATA_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY DATA_TYPE, DATA_DATE ORDER BY DATA_DATE DESC) AS DT_ORDER FROM SJPT_REALTIME_STATIC_WEEK T WHERE T.DATA_DATE BETWEEN #{preDay}AND #{day} and t.DATA_TYPE=#{type}) X WHERE X.DT_ORDER = 1

select w.DATA_TYPE,w.DATA_COUNT,w.IRSL_DATE,w.DATA_DATE from sjpt_realtime_static_week w join ( select t.DATA_DATE from ( select r.*, row_number() over( order by DATA_DATE desc) as rn from sjpt_realtime_static_week r where data_type=#{type} ) t where t.rn=1 ) q on w.DATA_DATE=q.DATA_DATE where w.data_type=#{type} order by w.data_type
